text: Na bamwe bagira icumbiko ryabo ngaha IMadina n’ugusukura ubu Isilamu imbere yabo, n’ukuba kunda abo bantu bimukiye iwabo, kandi ataco baronka, kandi badafise akariganga muhogo mu bikiriza vyabo kuri ivyo bahawe, kandi bakaba babakunda gusumba imitima yabo naho kuribo bafise uburyo bubayabaye, kandi bateshejwe nukuba ingumyi y’imitima yabo, abo nibo bafise intsinzi y’ukuri
